title: Meta Quarterly Earnings: Profit Declines With Losses in Reality Labs
description: The social networking company, which is trying to shift into the so-called metaverse, posted falling sales and said it was “making significant changes” to operate more efficiently.
dc:creator: Ryan Mac

media:content.media:description: Facebook renamed itself Meta a year ago, and the company has invested billions into the immersive digital world known as the metaverse.
